attributes.action: Start a no fly zone over Syrian cities and towns to protect civilians
attributes.additional_details: A no fly zone over some of the targeted cities and towns and for a sufficient period of time may achieve the limited goal of protecting those civilians.It may also strengthen the hand of moderate opposition in their fight against both Assad regime and I.S.
attributes.background: The relentless bombardment of Syrian civilians by air attacks is one of the main drives for their displacement.

rejection.details:
The UK doesn't directly control the airspace over Syria. You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106625

Or you could ask for the UK to work with other countries to establish a no fly zone.
